instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1278: What is A1278? A1278 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook or Macbook Pro Unibody from years Late 2008, Mid 2009, Mid 2010, Early 2011, Late 2011, Mid 2012 with EMC 2254, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2327, 820-2530, 820-2879, 820-2936, 820-3115..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1278</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2011
with ac adapter work ok
with ac adapter and battery work ok
with only battery run slow. When write something, letters appears 4,5 seg. later. Any idea?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Cannot find restore button in el Capitan to create ASD148. It is possible to do it with el Capitan or I need older version?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
Restore option is in the top menu.......

[url]https://support.apple.com/kb/PH22244?locale=en_US[/url]

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: I already know it will be VD0R issue. Check <TRANSISTOR>Q5300</TRANSISTOR>/10 and resistors for corrosion.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: <CHIP>U5410</CHIP> seems bad but I dont know what it does. Could be the problem?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Yes, replace... It is the current sensor for <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>........

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: It also is bad but does not cause running slow normally. Corrosion around <TRANSISTOR>Q5300</TRANSISTOR>/10 is also likely.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Yes Duke. You are 100% right. Was bad <TRANSISTOR>Q5300</TRANSISTOR>. Now works ok. SMC miss <SIGNAL>SMC_PBUS_VSENSE</SIGNAL> and run slow, but why? What <SIGNAL>SMC_PBUS_VSENSE</SIGNAL> says to SMC?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Ask the team that designed the SMC firmware. Just fix it and be happy it works.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: <CHIP>U5410</CHIP> is bad and no where to solder. All pads are missing. I tested the board and works fine. Do you think <CHIP>U5410</CHIP> is important to put?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Current sensor which should be present. Time to run a few wires.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Well, it runs fine, but when I put youtube fan runs at max. Could be bad <CHIP>U5410</CHIP>?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
Read answer from duke 1 post up. 
He already gave the answer

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Run ASD, check sensors and repair <CHIP>U5410</CHIP>.
